item.title: Can You Believe This Mom Got an 'F' on Her Spelling Test for 'Father'?!
item.description: I. Introduction We’ve all been there. We’ve all had that moment when we’ve been asked to spell a word and, for whatever reason, we just can’t get it right. But for one mom, that moment was particularly embarrassing as she got an ‘F’ on her spelling test for the word ‘father.’ II. Details of the Story The story of the mom and her spelling test was shared on Twitter by her daughter, who posted a photo of the test results with the caption “My mom got an F on her spelling test for the word ‘father.
